display_name: Overall RDI at 3% desat or arousal
description: RDI at 3% desat or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with arousal or >= 3% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba3 + hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 + carba3 + caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 3% desat or arousal
